structured.description: An interface `UserApiMapper` that provides mapping functions between business objects (`UserDto` and `User`) and REST API responses (`GetUserDetailsResponseUser`). The interface includes methods for converting a `CreateUserRequest` to a `UserDto`, a `Set<User>` to a `GetUserDetailsResponseUser` set, a `UserDto` to a `CreateUserResponse`, and a `UserDto` to a `GetUserDetailsResponseUser`.

items.description: Defines a set of mapping functions between business objects and REST API responses, using Mapstruct's automated mapping capabilities.
items.name: UserApiMapper

structured.description: An `AuthenticationException` class that extends `RuntimeException`. The class has a default constructor that sets the error message to "Credentials are incorrect or user does not exists". The class also uses Spring's `ResponseStatus` annotation to set the HTTP status code to `HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED`.

items.description:
Provides a customized exception response with a specific HTTP status code and error message when credentials are incorrect or the user does not exist.
Fields:
	- ERROR_MESSAGE (String): is a static string containing the message "Credentials are incorrect or user does not exist."

fields.name: ERROR_MESSAGE
fields.value: "Credentials are incorrect or user does not exists"
fields.description: is a static string containing the message "Credentials are incorrect or user does not exist."

items.name: AuthenticationException
